#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string>
 
using namespace std;
 
int a[]={0,1,4,3,8,5,2,7,6,9};
 
int digitsolver(int x){
	int s=0;
	while(x>0){
		s+=a[x%10];
		x/=10;
	}
	return s%10;
}
 
int main(){
	int t,a,b;
	long long sum;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
		sum=0;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
	
		while(a%10!=0){
			if(a>b)break;
			sum+=digitsolver(a);
			a++;
		}
		while(b%10!=9){
			if(b<a)break;
			sum+=digitsolver(b);
			b--;
		}
		if(b>a)sum+=(b-a+1)/10*45;
		cout<<sum<<endl;
		
	}
	return 0;
}
